sentences: Evencio Castellanos Yumar (May 3, 1915 â€“ March 16, 1984), was a Venezuelan pianist and classical musician.
From 1938 to 1944 Castellanos studied at the Superior School of Music of Caracas.
In 1947 he went to New York City on a two-year scholarship studying piano with Carlos Buhler.
He held various teaching positions in Caracas and founded the Collegium Musicum de Caracas, a Venezuelan musical group.
Alba Quintanilla was among his pupils.
